amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities Of The Second Class And Villages
amendatorysection.para: The mayor and council of cities of the second class and the chairperson and board of trustees of villages, as the case may be, shall have the power to levy a tax each year of not to exceed seven cents on each one hundred dollars upon the taxable value of all the taxable property in such cities or villages for the purpose of maintaining and operating a facility. They shall by ordinance determine and declare how the facility shall be managed.
